evidence.text: 31 | 2022-09-06 | PAPERLESS ORDER granting 29 Plaintiff's Unopposed Motion to File a Combined Response in Opposition to Motions to Dismiss by Defendants (DE19, DE23). Plaintiff is granted leave to file a combined response, not to exceed thirty (30) pages, to 19 Defendant Ramos' Motion to Dismiss and 23 Defendants City of Fort Lauderdale, Steve Smith, Herns Eugene, Paul Cristafaro, Steve Greenlaw, and Avery Figueras' Motion to Dismiss Plaintiff's Complaint and Incorporated Memorandum of Law. Plaintiff shall make sure to clearly delineate her response to the grounds for dismissal asserted in Defendants' separate filings. Signed by Judge Rodolfo A. Ruiz, II on 9/6/2022. (zse) (Entered: 09/06/2022)

extracted.value: Granted 29 Plaintiff's Unopposed Motion to File a Combined Response in Opposition to Motions to Dismiss by Defendants (DE19, DE23).
